list: 4 courses from the Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering
elective.note: A maximum of 2 500 level courses may be counted for credit. At least half of the courses used for credit must normally be Faculty of Engineering courses. An English for Multilingual Speakers (EMLS) technical/professional writing course for Engineers is required for all students who were not English Language Proficiency (ELP) exempt at the time of admission.

Architectural_Engineering.note: Alternatively, students have the option to complete 4 courses from the compulsory courses list. If students have already successfully completed the compulsory courses, they must complete alternate courses that are approved by the Department Associate Chair, Graduate Studies.
